title: 22 Couple Tattoos to Get With Your Special Person
description: When it comes to commemorating cherished memories, body artwork provides a unique way to make a statement via matching tattoos. From sibling tattoos to twin BFF ink, sharing a special moment with your loved one makes it even more significant. Similarly, permanently marking your love for your person is a major relationship milestone. No matter whether you're in the early dating stages or have been together for years, couple tattoos are an excellent way to celebrate your special bond and create a lasting memory. If you're contemplating getting inked with your significant other, keep reading. From subtle symbols with personal significance to bold, artistic, head-turning designs, there are plenty of options to consider that blend creativity with personal significance. While many people draw inspiration from their personal journey for a cute couple tattoo, certain timeless symbols, motifs, and themes make a simple, bold statement. For instance, a matching heart design or a ring tattoo are classic options to convey your affection toward each other. If you're hesitant to get anything too bold, you'll be happy to learn that there are plenty of small couple tattoo ideas out there that are tasteful and subtle. So no matter whether you're drawn to minimalistic designs that speak volumes with just a few lines or prefer intricate illustrations that tell your love story in vivid detail, we've rounded up plenty of couple tattoo ideas that will express your love in a beautifully permanent way. Related: The Fascinating Psychology Behind Couple Tattoos
author: Ina Bansal
excerpt: Make permanent memories with your person with these meaningful couple tattoo ideas, from symbolic designs to script pieces.
